sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"例子，事例"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: example, instance, case, sample, illustration, specimen
means: example ： 普通用词，指能代表同类事物性质或一般规律的典型例子。
instance ： 多指用于说明、支持或反证一般事实或理论的事例。
case ： 多指需要加以认真研究的实例，如病例，案例等。
illustration ： 指用来说明、解释某种理论或看法而引用的例证。
specimen可与sample换用，但常指人或物中选出的有代表性部分，或指供科研、化验或检验用的标本。

sentence.Network_en: The rally was organised at the instance of two senior cabinet ministers.
sentence.Network_cn: 集会是应两位资深内阁大臣的要求组织的。

sentence.Network_en: It is not a unique instance , but has its counterpart.
There are jobs more dangerous than truck driving; for instance, training lions.
sentence.Network_cn: 有的工作比驾驶卡车更危险, 例如驯狮.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 只有实例（instances）和常量（constants）可以被注入到run block中。这是为了避免进一步的系统配置在程序运行的过程中执行。
九年级英语单词表 ... specifically 特定地；明确的 instance 例子；实例 for instance 例如；比如.
操作系统事例(instances)。如此一来，企业就更容易把许多应用程序整合在单一硬件服务器上执行，并提供一定程度的可靠性。
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... installment 分期付款 instance 例证 instant 即刻.

list.abs: 一个流程实例(process instance)，是流程定义的一次执行过程。当流程实例被创建 ，一个令牌被创建，该令牌叫做这个流程实例的根 …
for instance ... at the instance of 在...请求之下; 在...的倡议之下 first instance 【律】第一审, 初审 for instance 例如.
实例变量（Instance Variables）：与对象的某个特定实例相关联，只有在该对象的事件脚本或函数中才能使用。并且随着对象的打开 …
大学英语四级常用词组 ... inquire for 询问(商店、地点等) for instance 例如，比如，举例说 instead of 代替；而不是….
大学英语四级常用词组 ... inquire for 询问(商店、地点等) for instance 例如，比如，举例说 instead of 代替；而不是….

jx.jx_cn_mean: (律)初审时。 参见 court of first instance
(正式)应…的要求，经…的请求；在…的鼓动下

lj.lj_ly: prosecution at the instance of the police.
lj.lj_ls: 应警方要求进行的起诉。

phrase.cizu_name: in the first (或second 等) instance

jx.jx_en_mean: in the first (or second etc.) place; at the first (or second etc.) stage of a proceeding
jx.jx_cn_mean: 首先（或其次等）；第一步（或第二步等）

lj.lj_ly: the appointment will be for three years in the first instance.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin instantia 'presence, urgency', from instare 'be present, press upon', from in- 'upon' + stare 'to stand'. The original sense was 'urgency, urgent entreaty', surviving in at the instance of. In the late 16th cent. the word denoted a particular case cited to disprove a general assertion, derived from medieval Latin instantia 'example to the contrary' (translating Greek enstasis 'objection'); hence the meaning ‘single occurrence’

entry.def: You use for instance to introduce a particular event, situation, or person that is an example of what you are talking about.

example.ex: There are a number of improvements; for instance, both mouse buttons can now be used...
example.tran: 在许多地方有了改进,例如,鼠标的左右键都可以使用了。

example.ex: Let your child make some of the small decisions concerning his daily routine. For instance, allow him to choose what clothes he wears at the weekend.
example.tran: 让孩子在日常生活中作一些小决定。比如,让他自己决定周末穿什么衣服。

entry.def: An instance is a particular example or occurrence of something.

example.ex: She cited an instance where their training had been a marvelous help in dealing with problems.
example.tran: 她举了一个所受训练为解决问题帮了大忙的实例。

example.ex: ...an investigation into a serious instance of corruption.
example.tran: 对一起严重的腐败事件的调查

entry.def: You say in the first instance to mention something that is the first step in a series of actions.

example.ex: In the first instance your child will be seen by an ear, nose and throat specialist...
example.tran: 你的孩子将首先由耳鼻喉专科医生来诊察。

example.ex: The post was for one year in the first instance with possible renewal to a further year.
example.tran: 该岗位初始为一年期,有可能会再续聘一年。

entry.def: If you do something at someone's instance, you do it because they have ordered or requested you to do it.

example.ex: The rally was organised at the instance of two senior cabinet ministers.
example.tran: 集会是应两位资深内阁大臣的要求组织的。

sentences.sentence: "it was a case of bad judgment"
"but there is always the famous example of the Smiths"

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stems_affixes.word_buile: stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+ing状态→n.站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物质;实质,本质;主旨;财产,资产
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+stance=stan站,立→放在下面之物
stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使符合标准, 使标准化
stems_affixes.word_buile: standard[n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的]+ize表动词→v.使符合标准, 使标准化

Sentence.sentence: Television repairman was a common occupation in the 1950s, for instance.

The authors documented an annual drop of as many as 120,000 cases of heart disease, 66,000 instances of stroke and 99,000 heart attacks caused by high blood pressure after a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt.

jushi.english: There have been several instances of terrorists planting bombs in the city.
jushi.chinese: 在这个城市已经有过几宗恐怖分子放置炸弹的事例。

jushi.english: Can you give an instance of the boy's ability?
jushi.chinese: 你能举例说明那个男孩的才能吗?
